cause.description:
For everyone that has lost a friend or relative to drunk driving or lost someone because of a drunk driver this is way to stop it. By raising awareness not only can we save someone from getting in a car after a long night of partying, but we can save someone's parent, friend, sister/brother, grandparent. It is VERY important that we put an end to this death toll!!!
1. president
2. vice president
3. treasurer
cause.name: teens against drunk driving
